casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Frank Edward BIGGS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2017

David B. Bachman, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rita M. Shair, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 687, 171 A.3d 457 (2017), is denied.
